E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Mickey Brantley
Dear Sir,
Mickey Brantley has an AVG of .322 at A Modesto A's!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
